text: (mese) biya vuvangen (josuva, kalef namæti) dedena kerehi allah dayava pahala kara tibuni. ovun (anit ayata) “oba (ovunge saktiya gæna biya novanu). ovunta viruddhava (ema nagaraye) edaratuva tek yanu. ehi oba ætulu vu vahama niyata vasanema oba jayagrahanaya karannehuya. oba (satya) visvasavantayin vasayen sitinnehu nam allahvama visvasa karanu” yayi pævasuha
